title: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
description: This self-learning plan provides a comprehensive introduction to cybersecurity, covering essential concepts, tools, and practices to protect digital assets and information from cyber threats.

weeks.title: Understanding Cybersecurity
learningObjectives: Grasp the basic concepts and importance of cybersecurity
Learn about common cyber threats and attack vectors
Familiarize with the principles of data protection and privacy
topicsToCover: Types of cyber threats (malware, phishing, ransomware, etc.)
weeklyTasks: Read introductory materials on cybersecurity concepts
Explore case studies of recent cyber attacks
Review global data protection and privacy regulations

resources.name: Cybersecurity Basics: A Hands-on Approach by Carlos Solari
Online articles and videos on recent cyber attacks
Overview of GDPR and other privacy laws

weeks.title: Cybersecurity Tools and Practices
learningObjectives: Understand the role of cybersecurity tools in threat mitigation
Learn about encryption, firewalls, and antivirus software
Explore best practices for secure internet browsing and email communication
weeklyTasks: Install and configure basic cybersecurity tools (antivirus, firewall)
Adopt secure browsing and email habits

resources.name: Guides on setting up and using cybersecurity tools
Tutorials on encryption and secure communication
Best practices for internet browsing and email security

weeks.title: Network Security
learningObjectives: Learn the fundamentals of network security
Understand how to secure home and office networks
Explore the basics of Virtual Private Networks (VPNs) and their usage
topicsToCover: Introduction to VPNs and their importance
weeklyTasks: Set up and use a VPN service
Analyze your network's security posture with basic tools

resources.name: Online courses and articles on network security

weeks.title: Cybersecurity in Practice
learningObjectives: Apply cybersecurity knowledge to protect digital assets
Understand the basics of ethical hacking and penetration testing
Learn about careers and certifications in cybersecurity
weeklyTasks: Research cybersecurity career paths and certifications

resources.name: Cybersecurity for Beginners by Raef Meeuwisse
Overview of cybersecurity certifications (e.g., CompTIA Security+, CEH)
